text: Betty Jean Ward (born 1944), professionally known as B. J. Ward, is an American actress and singer. She is the creator and star of Stand-Up Opera. She was born in Wilmington, Delaware. She toured with the Groundlings for a short while before starting her voice over career on Hanna-Barbera's Jana of the Jungle in 1978. From 1966 to 1978, she was married to pianist Donn Trenner. Later, she was married to director Gordon Hunt from 1995 until his death in 2016. They had a daughter. ==References== ==Other websites== * * B. J. title: B. J. Ward
